environment.logic.constructs

Class Construct

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.logic.constructs.Construct
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arganok, DefaultPlayer, DefaultTerrain, Grunt, LevelChange

    public abstract class Construct
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that denotes aggregates a sprite and stores its own position.
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
